fr.univ_nantes.alma.engine

Interface EngineBridge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Engine

    public interface EngineBridge
    The interface of the package engine. The Client component can use it to run the game.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Alexis Claveau, Martin Ars, Maud Van Dorssen, Alexis Loret

      • createGame

        Game createGame(Player player1,
                Player player2)
        Create a game with an uuid and two players.
        Parameters:
        uuidGame - the uuid of the game
        player1 - the first player
        player2 - the second player
        Returns:
        the game

        void endTurn(java.util.UUID uuidGame)
        End the turn.

      • playCard

        void playCard(java.util.UUID uuidGame,
              int idCard)
        Play a card. Either put a minion card on the board or activate a spell card.
        Parameters:
        idCard - the id of the card
        uuidGame - the id of the game

      • heroPower

        void heroPower(java.util.UUID uuidGame,
               Player player,
               int idTarget)
        Activate the hero's power.
        Parameters:
        uuidGame - the id of the game
        idTarget - the id of the target, if the power doesn't need a target then set idTarget to -1

      • attack

        void attack(java.util.UUID uuidGame,
            int idAttack,
            int idTarget)
        Attack a card or a hero.
        Parameters:
        uuidGame - the id of the game
        idAttack - the id of the attacker
        idTarget - the id of the target
